title: Customized Online Job-Specific Language Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related language proficiency and intermediate specialized field knowledge
context.additional_context: Tailored education based on language use scenarios specific to learners' work environments (medical, legal, technical). Emphasis on real-time interaction and feedback using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately distinguish and use 10 core terms required in their professional field (medical/legal/technical).
Learners develop the ability to analyze job-related documents (medical records/contracts/technical reports) and extract three key points.
Learners can use professional language expressions (patient explanations/legal arguments/technical descriptions) in real-time during video conferences.
Learners can identify and implement two improvement points in their communication methods based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
